name: Memory (LanceDB Local)
description: LanceDB-backed long-term memory plugin with local/OpenAI embeddings + auto-recall/capture

embedding.provider.label: Embedding Provider
embedding.provider.help: Select where embeddings come from (local GGUF or OpenAI).

embedding.apiKey.label: OpenAI API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: Required when provider=openai. You can also use ${OPENAI_API_KEY}.

embedding.model.label: Embedding Model
embedding.model.help: Model name for embeddings. For local, you can use a GGUF filename.

embedding.modelPath.label: Local Model Path
embedding.modelPath.help: Path to the GGUF file (used when provider=local).

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations (PII-safe).

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context.
